CREATE DATABASE RetailDB;
GO
USE RetailDB;
GO

CREATE MASTER KEY ENCRYPTION BY PASSWORD = 'sasSql@25';
GO

CREATE DATABASE SCOPED CREDENTIAL SynapseMI
WITH IDENTITY = 'Managed Identity';
GO

CREATE EXTERNAL DATA SOURCE RetailDataLake
WITH (
    LOCATION = 'https://dftestsa1910.dfs.core.windows.net/',
    CREDENTIAL = SynapseMI);  -- or SAS_Credential);
GO

CREATE EXTERNAL FILE FORMAT CsvFormat
WITH (
    FORMAT_TYPE = DELIMITEDTEXT,
    FORMAT_OPTIONS (FIELD_TERMINATOR = ',', STRING_DELIMITER = '"', FIRST_ROW = 2)
);
GO

CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE dbo.Retail_Sales_Sample_Data
(
    [OrderID] INT,
    [OrderDate] DATE,                         -- ✅ Changed to DATE
    [Region] NVARCHAR(50),                    -- ✅ Shortened to 50
    [Category] NVARCHAR(50),                  -- ✅ Shortened to 50
    [Product] NVARCHAR(100),                  -- ✅ Slightly larger, product names vary
    [Quantity] INT,
    [UnitPrice] INT,
    [Discount] INT,
    [SalesAmount] FLOAT,
    [Profit] FLOAT
)
WITH (
    LOCATION = 'my-container/retail_sample/Retail_Sales_Sample_Data.csv',
    DATA_SOURCE = RetailDataLake,
    FILE_FORMAT = CsvFormat
);
GO

SELECT TOP 10 * FROM dbo.Retail_Sales_Sample_Data;
go

-- List all users in the current database
SELECT name AS [UserName],
       type_desc AS [UserType]
FROM sys.database_principals
WHERE type IN ('S', 'E', 'X', 'U') 
  AND name NOT LIKE '##%';
  go


  -- List all database roles and their members
SELECT r.name AS RoleName,
       m.name AS MemberName
FROM sys.database_role_members drm
JOIN sys.database_principals r ON drm.role_principal_id = r.principal_id
JOIN sys.database_principals m ON drm.member_principal_id = m.principal_id
ORDER BY r.name;
go


-- Create AAD user for Power BI or your user
CREATE USER [purviewtester@skiganeshgmail.onmicrosoft.com] FROM EXTERNAL PROVIDER;
GO

-- Grant read permissions
ALTER ROLE db_datareader ADD MEMBER [purviewtester@skiganeshgmail.onmicrosoft.com];
GO

-- Grant your user access to use the credential
GRANT REFERENCES ON DATABASE SCOPED CREDENTIAL::[SynapseMI]
TO [purviewtester@skiganeshgmail.onmicrosoft.com];
GO


SELECT *
FROM sys.database_scoped_credentials;

FROM sys.external_data_sources;
